text: A19:Cos. in devel mkts should look to partner with govt., schools to align skillset to future job demand. #MercerChat

text: A18:Smaller cos actually have an advantage.Nimbler more flex & adaptable.Music to an ee's ears. #MercerChat

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: A17:Ea gen has diff needs.Plan 4 them.Disengaged ees harm morale & productivity.Cos need a clear purpose & value set that aligns.#MercerChat

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: A16:As long as it results in more & meaningful management/ee career and real time performance discussions #MercerChat

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: A15:40%of workforce will leave as baby boomers retire.Some will shift 2 new careers.Need to be flex as cos solve for individuals #MercerChat

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: A14:Career planning and flexibility is paramount. Followed by customized benefits that support different lifestyles & outcomes. #MercerChat

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: A13:Creative assessment tools ie neuroscience/gamification which broaden talent pool 4 competitive advantage selection outcomes #MercerChat

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: A12: We're living and working longer. Rather than retire, more opps for freelance, contract talent, flex work. #MercerChat

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: A11:Traditional gender diversity programs not enough. Need to understand cultural diffs. Implemnt customized gender programs. #MercerChat

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: A10:The e/ee relationship will certainly change.More accountability for ee's for sure.Creative ways to connect for employers #MercerChat

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: A9:Creative assessment and talent specific tools,ie neuroscience and gamification teach discipline execution for success. #MercerChat

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: A8:By 2020 50% of workforce will b freelancers...lots of flexibility in employees hands. #MercerChat

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: A7:Co's in LatAm who achieve #genderequality will outperform...data clearly points to that conclusion. #MercerChat

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: A7:Co's in LatAm who achieve #genderequality will outperform...data clearly points to that conclusion. #MercerChat

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: A6:By 2020 50% of workers w/b freelancers.Flexibility will be paramount to success. #MercerChat

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: A5:More specificity to diff benefits generational needs will win the day. #MercerChat

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: Q4:Have purpose,purposeful values,connect digitally. Their aspirations count. #MercerChat

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: Q3:Progress made but we havent done enough b more mindful & passionate about issues this is the most powerful impact to GDP +30% #MercerChat

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: A2b: Millennials value Autonomy/Empowerment, Mastery (learning), Purposeful organization and career path #MercerChat.

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: A2:Millennials now make up the largest segment of the workforce #MercerChat

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: HAppy to be doing my first Tweet chat.....looking forward to getting your questions.

name: Julio A. Portalatin
text: A1: 78% of ee's would stay w/ current employer if they knew their career path. Need career frameworks to help ee's grow, succeed.#MercerChat
